title: SOLD: T5 Pinkerton Cabinet - Jack Lapp - SGC A
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: SOLD: T5 Pinkerton Cabinet - Jack Lapp - SGC A
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I'm selling the pictured T5 Pinkerton Cabinet card of Jack Lapp.  These are impossible to find, so the damaged cardboard mount should be excusable in this case.  The image of Lapp itself remains intact as you can see.

Price is [STRIKE]$140[/STRIKE] SOLD delivered for this rarity - thanks for looking!
Scott
Bump to reduce by $20 - thanks for looking....
